content: Many people had enbarked on projects and sometimes find it difficult to source for their materials as a result of engagements which cost them time, divided attention and poor concentration  which leads to them abandoning the project because of the load and work pressure. Sometimes, it can be as a result of materials needed being inaccessible.   I can help you source or research online for your materials, equipments etc as the need maybe to reduce your work pressure and guarantee you work oriented success. My charges/fee are less affordable and negotiable based on your offer and I accept payment in btc.Field for which I can source and research for includes;Academic sector  Agricultural sector Crypto Start ups Energy Sector  General Logistics Travel and Tour Workforce Mobilization. EtcI will accept escrow but must be a reputable and high rank member of this platform.NB! I will only commence work after confirmation of funds in escrow owned wallet for transparency and without any bias.If I start updating you with results of your offer, I will receive %50 of the total amount payable as charges then the rest %50 can be received after work completion. NB! If you are ok with the terms and conditions then you can pm me with your offer.
